page.title: 14EDUCATION_SCHOOL OUTINGS
page.content: Our First Year trip was to{Blackpool } Zoo.When we were in the First Year the trip sounded exciting,but now I am a Fourth Year it sounds boring.We saw animals like zebras,lions and tigers.In the Second Year,we went to {Blackpool Model Village}in Stanley Park and then to the {Tower Circus} In the Third Year,we dressed up and acted like{Tudor people}in a Tudor house.We were wearing heavy costumes,and the day we were there,the weather was boiling hot. This year we went to {Camelot}at Charnock Richard.It was a lovely day and we had a great time on the {Space {Ride}which went really fast.It was good on the{Big Wheel}but the person I sat next to kept rocking the chair.It was the best School Trip ever.A School Trip is when the class pays money to go by coach somewhere.Claire Walmsley.
